name: DUOS
description:
DUOS is a short 3D puzzle platformer game from a first person perspective inspired by "Fireboy and Watergirl". It's a part of the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 and was made in 7 days. DUOS features 2 neon-styled levels, the tutorial and the main game.

Your goal is simple: Get to the finish using the two blocks, buttons and... more blocks?

Game time:

It's a very short game. If you've played the tutorial and play the main game, you'll take 5-10 minutes to finish.

Developer's own perspective on the game:

It's a huge improvement to my last game on itch.io, but there's definetly room to improve. I was glad to have a modeller (https://itch.io/profile/srce420) for this since it wouldn't have nearly looked as appealing as this. 

I hope for some feedback so I can learn for the next jam!

Known issues:

  • Some glitches
  • Missing animations (shouldn't affect the progress of the player)
